item.title: Mobile as a Microbit
item.description:
Description

Title Talk by Rishabh Singh, Anuvrat Parashar, Sanyam Khurana ( @rishabhstalwart,@bhanuvrat,@ErSanyamKhurana ) at #PyDelhiConf2016 on 05th Mar 2016. Slides and content available at stalwartrishabh.github.io/mobilemicrobit.

Visit https://pydelhi.org/talks for more.
item.dc:creator: Rishabh Singh
